title: Ask an Australian about government

description: Describes the democratic government framework existing in Australia, covering its historical develop- ment, voting provisions, elections, and the respective Federal, State and Local government powers. Also available in Greek, Italian, Serbo-Croatian, Spanish and Turkish languages.
